1111011000000101 1101010110100001 1 -> sum: 1100101110100111, cout: 1
0100010010000001 0110011001111001 0 -> sum: 1010101011111010, cout: 0
0011101101111000 1110100101011000 1 -> sum: 0010010011010001, cout: 1
1011000101001110 1111010010100010 1 -> sum: 1010010111110001, cout: 1
1110011000101101 0001110001011110 0 -> sum: 0000001010001011, cout: 1
1100000111110010 1101011000101111 0 -> sum: 1001100000100001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
